name: BYU-I iLearn - Nichols
description:
Increase space on to take quizzes.
Drop-down Nav Bar.
additional_info:
This started out as just a way to increase the quiz size from less than half the page to a full page tall, so I could see everything when i took quizzes.
It ended up being a rewrite of the status bar and a lot of other things. 

If you have any requests. leave me a note/feedback.

****NOTE****
There is an optional green box-shadow around the quizzes, and all iFrames. I personally like being able to see what exactly is in an iFrame, and what isn't. but since that's going to be the outlier, I'll go ahead and leave it commented out. It is the first property in the document.
****/NOTE****

Change log:
01/21/2018:
Fixed Nav bar to top of screen.
Created roll-out function on hover to save space.
added padding to body and removed gradient from Nav bar so you could see top of the main content page.
shortened the title on quizzes.
re-ordered some of the Nav bar to make it flow better.
